Key Arguments: Censorship is used to hide debate and truth.
Information previously labeled as misinformation has later been proven true.
Censorship is linked to criminal activities and collusion.
There are no statutes of limitations for crimes related to censorship of vaccine information.
Main Themes: Concerns about vaccine information and big pharma influence
Notable Quotes: It is never the virtuous who censor information.
The censoring of information is a clear attempt to hide debate and truth.
TRUTH has ways of coming to the surface, and lies have ways of backfiring that we never expected.
